name: v0 for iOS
tagline: Build anything with AI
description: v0 by Vercel is your collaborative AI assistant to design, iterate, and scale full-stack applications for the web.

name: Alai
tagline: Create high quality presentations using AI
description: Alai gives 4 options for each slide so that you can discover something that feels right. With Alaiâ€™s system of elements, making edits is easy without wasting time tweaking pixels.

name: AI CMO by Lindy
tagline: Launch 1000s of marketing experiments in minutes
description: Lindy is the easiest platform to build no code agents. We shipped marketing actions including Sora 2, Veo 3.1, GPT Imagen, and Nano Banana. Combined them into 3 CMO agents that run campaigns end-to-end.

name: Starbase
tagline: Browser-based MCP server testing with AI chat integration
description: Browser-based playground for MCP servers. Test any remote MCP server, debug tools, and chat with Claude/ChatGPT using your custom integrations. Fully MCP compatible, with built-in LLM chat.

name: Presentation 2.0 by CubeOne
tagline: Never make slides again
description: We make you ready, not just slides. Most AI give you slides to study. CubeOne gives you the story, script, and visuals so you can present right away. Go from nothing to stage-ready in 5 min. Stop making slides, start telling the story.

name: Mico
tagline: A vibrant new way to talk with Copilot
description: Mico is a new animated persona for Microsoft Copilot's voice mode. It adds visual expressions like smiles and nods to make conversations feel more natural and adaptive. Powered by Copilot, Mico reacts in real-time and can be personalized with different colors.

name: Velona AI
tagline: AI that finds hidden fleet costs before they hit your P&L
description: Autonomous AI agents that find hidden fleet costs, predict failures, and identify risks in real-time. Works with any telematics provider or OEM. Built on Databricks. Your data stays yours. Get answers in seconds, not weeks.

name: Phare Incident AI
tagline: Smart incident summaries powered by Magistral small
description: Phare's Incident AI digests all the fine details and churns out readable summaries and post-mortem of incidents, saving you from squinting at endless logs like a caffeinated mole.

name: 72 Hour Clients
tagline: Get new leads and clients in 72 hours.
description: 72 Hour Clients is a AI-powered, guided challenge to get new leads and clients in 72 hours. Proven by 300+ freelancer, agencies and service firms since 2017 and backed by a 100% win your money back guarantee.

name: Lookio
tagline: If NotebookLM had an API - Reliable RAG agents made easy
description: Lookio lets you build AI assistants that answer questions using your company's documents. Perfect for automating customer support, scaling content creation, and powering workflows. API-first design with flexible query modes. Start free with 250 credits.

name: Datapizza AI Framework
tagline: AI framework: open source, reliable, scalable & customizable
description: Datapizza AI Framework gives engineers full control to create trustworthy GenAIâ€”without unnecessary complexity. Built for engineers who need flexibility and transparency, it fits your stack and lets you customize every layer, from model choice to deployment.

name: Teleprompter & Captions AI
tagline: Record videos with a teleprompter
description: Create engaging videos for social media without stress and complicated editing. Our app is an all-in-one studio that lets you read a script from the screen while recording, then instantly add eye-catching AI captions that keep your audience hooked.

name: AI SDK Directory
tagline: Best AI projects in one place!
description: Explore a curated collection of AI SDK projects, tools, and libraries. Find inspiration and resources to kickstart your AI development journey.

name: Ledgerize
tagline: Automate Financial Data Extraction with Ledgerize AI
description: Getting your transactions from bank statements into Excel or simply converting statements into usable data can feel like a spreadsheet hell. Ledgerize was built specifically to solve this common pain point.

name: Prefume
tagline: Your Preference in Perfume
description: Transform how you experience and remember your fragrances with Prefume, the personal fragrance assistant designed for perfume enthusiasts, collectors, and newcomers alike.

name: VisualGPT
tagline: Image Generator, Photo Editor with AI Free
description: VisualGPT is all-in-one AI image platform to generate, edit, enhance, and transform images. Easily create stunning photos, illustrations, and visual designs online.

name: JekyllPad
tagline: Static Sites Content Made Easy. Zero Markdown or Code.
description: JekyllPad is a 100% offline Content Management System built for static websites (Jekyll, Github Pages, Astro, Hugo, Eleventy, Gatsby, etc). It enables anyone to write, manage, and publish content instantly, with zero Git, Code, Markdown knowledge.

name: Elixion
tagline: AI-driven project management with human collaboration
description: Elixion.ai is an AI-native workspace that transforms how teams plan, build, and scale. By combining human software engineers with intelligent agents, we automate workflows, optimize collaboration, and help businesses unlock their teamâ€™s full potential.

name: Uplift UI
tagline: Component library
description: UpliftUI a modern button component library built with Next.js, TypeScript, Tailwind, and Framer Motion. Copy, paste, and create stunning, accessible buttons for your web appsâ€”no coding required! ðŸš€

name: Crawlbyte
tagline: Browserless web scraping platform. Scrape anything, anywhere
description: Crawlbyte is the easiest way to extract any public web data at scale - without writing code and without the slow, resource-heavy browser sessions that most scrapers rely on.
